metadata.title: CVE-2021-30559 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.164allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
